fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: FOCIL proposed as Hegotá headliner; CL headliner decision on Feb 19 ACDC
CL spec updates targeting Feb 19: IL bitlist inclusivity and compliance checks

specification_changes.highlight: IL bitlist added to bids as signal; informational only, not used in fork choice
PTC validates bitlist inclusivity; payload can be compliant even with non-inclusive bitlist
Attesters validate IL compliance; expect beacon block to reorg IL-noncompliant envelopes

research_updates.highlight: One-slot delay analysis: only 0.1% improvement in inclusion; 20% transactions already included
Censorship detection: transactions valid, above 10-25th percentile priority fee, pending 2+ blocks
Full IL inclusion recommended over censorship-only ILs based on current data

action_items.action: Finalize CL spec PR with IL bitlist and compliance check changes
Complete Block Native data analysis for higher resolution delay research

decisions.decision: IL bitlist serves informational purpose only; not enforced in fork choice
Payload IL compliance validated against local view, not builder's bitlist

targets.target: February 19th - ACDC call to decide CL headliner and review CL spec
End of week - CL spec PR submission with proposed changes
